preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 grams of Boro (B), 2 grams of Beryllium (Be), and 80 grams of Niobium (Nb) using a precise scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the weighed materials thoroughly. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder to ensure uniform distribution.
